results.name: Number of partitions of n, where the difference between the number of odd parts and the number of even parts is 8.
comment: With offset 16 number of partitions of n, where the difference between the number of odd parts and the number of even parts is -8.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 8..1000
maple: b:= proc(n, i, t) option remember; `if`(abs(t)>n, 0,
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Mar 30 2014
